spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement are highly accurate. Most doors and windows are correctly positioned. However, the window in the bottom-right kitchen area is misplaced (on the right wall instead of the bottom wall), and there is minor distortion in the entrance hallway scale.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. No rooms are missing, no text labels or measurement lines are present, the roof is correctly removed, and the model is perfectly floating on a neutral dark background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan well in block-style. Minor deduct for the addition of an extra sofa-like element or console in the living room area not present in the original 2D plan, and the orientation of the kitchen corner unit.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly aesthetic with flat shading and soft ambient lighting. The isometric orthographic camera angle is professionally executed. Slight loss of one point for minor texture-like gradients on the bedding, though it remains within the non-photorealistic style.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen window misplaced on the right-side wall instead of the bottom boundary wall.
Hallucinated extra furniture unit or long console placed against the wall in the living room/lounge area.
